levelList.name: Tenacious Wound
levelList.desc: If target has 6+ [Laceration] Potency, gain Coin Power +1 and gain +1 to [Laceration] Potency and Count inflicted by this Skill

levelList.name: Wound
levelList.desc: If target has 6+ [Laceration] Potency, gain Coin Power +1 and gain +1 to [Laceration] Potency and Count inflicted by this Skill

levelList.name: Brambles that Constrict
levelList.desc:
If target has 6+ [Laceration] Potency, this Skill inflicts +1 more [Laceration] Potency
If target has 15+ (sum of [Laceration] Potency and [Laceration] Count), gain +2 Atk Weight

levelList.name: Polydipsic Petals
levelList.desc:
Attacks the target with the highest sum of [Laceration] Potency + Count
[WhenUse] Coin Power +1 for every 6 [Laceration] Potency on target (max 2)

coindescs.desc: [OnSucceedAttack] Activate [Laceration] on the target once (reduce [Laceration] Count by 1)

levelList.name: Bursting Petals
levelList.desc:
Attacks the target with the highest sum of [Laceration] Potency + Count
[WhenUse] Coin Power +1 for every 6 [Laceration] Potency on target (max 2)

coindescs.desc: [OnSucceedAttack] Activate all [Laceration] on the target (completely reduce [Laceration] Count)

levelList.name: Storm of Spikes
levelList.desc: [WhenUse] If target has 6+ [Laceration] Potency, Final Power +2

coindescs.desc: [OnSucceedAttack] Activate [Laceration] on the target once (reduce [Laceration] Count by 1)

levelList.name: Endless Spring of Blood
levelList.desc:
[DuelCounter]
[WhenUse] Targets that clash against this Skill do not lose [Laceration] Count while clashing

coindescs.desc: [OnSucceedAttack] Activate [Laceration] on the target once, and immediately consume [BloodDinner] generated by the [Laceration] damage
[OnSucceedAttack] Activate [Laceration] on the target once, and immediately consume [BloodDinner] generated by the [Laceration] damage
[OnSucceedAttack] Activate [Laceration] on the target once, and immediately consume [BloodDinner] generated by the [Laceration] damage

levelList.name: Nutrient Craving
levelList.desc:
Activates at 100+ [BloodDinner]
[EndBattle] Consume up to 100 [BloodDinner] to activate the following effects:
- Heal the Core and the Body Parts' HP by [BloodDinner] consumed
- Gain 1 [AttackUp] next turn for every 20 [BloodDinner] consumed

levelList.name: Brambles that Yearn
levelList.desc:
[WhenUse] Consume up to 100 [BloodDinner] to activate the following effects:
- Heal the Core and the Body Parts' HP by [BloodDinner] consumed
- This Skill gains Final Power +1 for every 20 [BloodDinner] consumed
[EndSkill] If this Skill consumed less than 30 [BloodDinner], gain 2 [Vulnerable] next turn

levelList.name: Answer Me, Jia Baoyu
levelList.desc:
[CantChangeTarget]
Prioritizes the target with the earliest Deployment order
[WinDuel] Inflict +4 [Burst] Count
[DefeatDuel] If the target has the earliest Deployment order, inflict 1 [Teaching]

levelList.name: Tiangang Star - Form (格)
levelList.desc:
Prioritizes the target with the earliest Deployment order
Coin Power -2 for every [Teaching] on target
[DefeatDuel] Cannot Stagger with this attack. Gain 24 [DefenseDown] for this Encounter
[DefeatDuel] Deal -50% damage

coindescs.desc: [UnBrokenCoinOnSucceedAttack] Deal +5% damage for every ([Burst] Potency on target + [Burst] Count on target + number of Deathrite types on target) (max 100%)

levelList.name: Precious Jade's Cradle [寶玉搖籃]
levelList.desc:
[CantChangeTarget]
Prioritizes the target with the earliest Deployment order
When this Skill targets the target with the earliest Deployment order, deal 0 damage
[EndSkill] When this Skill targets the unit with the earliest Deployment order, Stagger them, then turn them into [ExpensiveJade] next turn; then, end the turn

levelList.name: Like a Roaring Storm
levelList.desc:
[CantDuel]
[CantChangeTarget]
This Skill attacks targets that are not the earliest in the Deployment order
Uses the Heishou Pack - Mao Branch to Stagger every Identity except for the Identity with the earliest Deployment order next turn; this unit recovers from Stagger
[EndSkill] Ends turn

levelList.name: You do not know the fathoms of the eye's powers, its special nature
levelList.desc:
Prioritizes the target with the earliest Deployment Order
[WhenUse] When there is Baoyu, the Precious Jade, convert all Coins on this Skill to [SuperCoin]s
[WhenUse] Coin Power +1 for every 5 (sum of [Laceration] and [Burst] on target) (max 2)

levelList.name: Please Watch me, O Xianren...!
levelList.desc:
Prioritizes the target with the earliest Deployment Order
[WinDuel] Gain 5 [Breath] and +2 [Breath] Count
[DefeatDuel] Gain 2 [AttackUp] and 2 [DefenseDown] next turn

levelList.name: Still, you can do nothing
levelList.desc:
[WhenUse] Heal 8 SP
[WhenUse] If the main target has less than 50% HP, or if the main target has 10+ (sum of [Burst] and [Laceration]), convert this Skill's Coins to [SuperCoin]s
[DefeatDuel] Gain 1 [Vulnerable]
- When losing a clash against Hong Lu, gain 2 [Vulnerable] instead

coindescs.desc: [OnSucceedAttack] Deal 10 SP damage and raise target's Stagger Threshold by 50% of damage dealt
